attributes.action: Take UAE & TURKEY off red travel list
attributes.additional_details: The travel to UAE & Turkey os good for families in the UK to get away after a stressful 18 months of being in/out of lockdown. Myself as a key worker who manages a retail park and had to work through all of the pandemic needs a breaks like all other key workers.
attributes.background: The Government needs to take UAE & Turkey off the red list because they have high vaccination levels and minimal deaths unlike the UK which is spiralling out of control.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

To remove the UAE off the ‘Red List’ by the Summer: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575787

Remove Turkey from the red list: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179
